item.title: Can some1 fix this?
item.dc:creator: @stupidleung4 stupidleung4
item.description:
@stupidleung4 wrote:

Starting Testscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594
Execption in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “1200 3214 3378 0 3214
3378 1 Tyras Guard”

Everytime I add an npc it keeps doing that and I cant connect to my server. Im doing x x x x2’s tutorial on addying npc’s on your server.

and can some1 also fix this?
handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);
resetItems(3214);
resetBank();
update();
}
[glow=red,2,300]//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=1643; //black cavalier playerEquipment[playerCape]=2414; //zamorak cape playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1713; //amulet of glory playerEquipment[playerChest]=1035; //zamorak robe playerEquipment[playerShield]=2659; //zamorak kiteshield playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1033; //zamorak robe playerEquipment[playerHands]=775; //cooking gauntlets playerEquipment[playerFeet]=4131; //rune boots playerEquipment[playerRing]=2573; //ring of wealth playerEquipment[playerArrows]=5627; //rune arrow (s) playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=2417; //zamorak staff[/glow]
public void update()
{
handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);

	flushOutStream();
}

Ok the highlighted is the player equipment start. It doesnt work, Is it possible the player cant wear cuz of the level? OK but i tried putting bronze in but still it dont work.

Read full topic
